Item.Value: Greetings, my name is $0$. I've heard that you're a warrior, is it true? I hope so, I can only do so much here.[Yes:IntroYes|No:IntroNo|Maybe:IntroMaybe]
Oh. How interesting. In that case, you should speak with $2$, he and his husband make excellent weapons.
Hello $^$. I hope you're well today.
You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.
Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?
Hello, what can I do for you?.[Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Nothing]
